tokens.text: defines a fog settings document structure

title: Fog Settings Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition fog settings definition document. Fog settings control the appearance of fog in different environments including distance-based fog, volumetric fog density, and media coefficients for scattering and absorption effects.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this fog settings file. Use '1.16.100' or later.

fields.title: Fog Settings
fields.description: The fog settings definition containing description, distance, and volumetric properties.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The unique identifier for this fog setting, e.g., 'custom:my_fog'.

fields.title: Distance
fields.description: Distance-based fog settings for air, water, lava, and weather conditions.

fields.title: Volumetric
fields.description: Volumetric fog settings including density and media coefficients.
